string.name: better_relationship
string.b: Want a better relationship with food?

resources.string:
In our application you can find new recipes to make from products that are in your fridge.

That sounds very simple, right?

Also you will be able to add recipes to your "favorites" list.

One more thing - now you can also calculate your calorie intake.

If you are struggling with calorie counting and healthy eating, then this is the right place for you!

Join us Now!
LazyFit Creators
